name: Dark and colored Moodle
description:
Dark theme for moodle Choose your color : https://material.io/guidelines/style/color.html#color-color-palette
Works for the "Essential" Moodle Theme
Here are sets of different color that can be used :
First color | Lighter version
Red | #B71C1C | #D50000
Indigo | #1A237E | #304FFE
Blue | #0D47A1 | #2962FF
Green | #1B5E20 | #4CAF50
Yellow | #F57F17 | #FFD600
Orange| #E65100 | #FF6D00
Brown | #3E2723 | #4E342E
Dark | #212121 | #424242
